title: Combining $$x^3$$ Terms
text: The first step is to simplify the $$x^3$$ term. However, since, $$2x^3$$ is the only $$x^3$$ term in the expression, this term stays the same.
speech: The first step is to simplify the  x cubed  term. However, since,  2 x cubed,  is the only  x cubed  term in the expression, this term stays the same.
pacedSpeech: The first step is to simplify the   x cubed
term in the expression, this term stays the same.

title: Combining $$x^2$$ Terms
text: The next step is to simplify the $$x^2$$ term.
speech: The next step is to simplify the  x squared  term.
pacedSpeech: The next step is to simplify the   x squared

title: Combining $$x^2$$ Terms
text: We simplify the $$x^2$$ term by combining the coefficients of the values with $$x^2$$. The coefficients with $$x^2$$ are $$5x^2$$ and $$2x^2$$. By adding these values, we simplify the $$x^2$$ term.
speech: We simplify the  x squared  term by combining the coefficients of the values with  x squared . The coefficients with  x squared  are  5 x squared,  and  2 x squared, . By adding these values, we simplify the  x squared  term.
pacedSpeech: term by combining the coefficients of the values with   x squared
. By adding these values, we simplify the   x squared

title: Combining $$x^2$$ Terms
speech: What is , 5 x squared, plus 2 x squared ?
pacedSpeech: What is  , 5 x squared, plus 2 x squared

title: Combining $$x$$ Terms
text: Now we need to combine the terms with $$x$$ by adding $$-x$$ and $$-3x$$.
speech: Now we need to combine the terms with  x  by adding  negative x  and  negative 3 x .
pacedSpeech: Now we need to combine the terms with   x

title: Combining $$x$$ Terms

subHints.title: Combining Constants
subHints.text: Finish simplifying the expression by adding the constants. What is $$1-4$$?

speech: What is  minus x plus negative 3 x ?
pacedSpeech: What is   minus x plus negative 3 x

title: Simplified Expression
text: We can finally rewrite the expression as a sum of the simplified terms: $$2x^3+7x^2-4x-3$$.
speech: We can finally rewrite the expression as a sum of the simplified terms:  2 x cubed, plus 7 x squared, minus 4 x minus 3 .
pacedSpeech: We can finally rewrite the expression as a sum of the simplified terms:   2 x cubed, plus 7 x squared, minus 4 x minus 3
